summary: BuildRequest specified no changes and no requirements, but the diff modifies project_state.json to describe a Sports Shop app and lists multiple REQ-* features, which constitutes unrequested scope changes in project metadata.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata to describe building a Sports Shop web app and enumerate multiple requested features (REQ-1 through at least REQ-9, and more truncated), despite the BuildRequest explicitly requesting no changes/new features.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest states "No changes requested" and "Requirements: none" / "Do not add new features or modify existing checkout/payment behavior". The only change is to project_state.json adding/maintaining a feature list and summary unrelated to the request.
